channel.title: Pages on Blossom Languages
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Blossom Languages

item.title: About
item.description: Learning a foreign language Hello! I am not a polyglot learning my 10th language. I am just like you, struggling to learn my first foreign language. I have been at it for some time but I still have a long way to go. I want to use this blog to learn from and interact with the language learning community. For me, my motto for learning German is simple. Do or do not, there is no try
